subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Franks statement is true,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Ya take anything as gospel. I go by the voices I get, they keep going on
and on about the end of the cycle. They seem to claim that just before the
big event, London, or England gets obliterated. I thnk that's supposed to be
October 2012, so if/when that doesn't happen.....

 F-S
